Text:
@YIFY: Is there any chance you can add some info on the audio (codec, bitrate, channels)?
Last time I downloaded a movie I found out that it was at 31kb/s and 2 channels only. A movie like this one should be in 5.1 with 192 kb/s.
Has anyone info on the audio?
Audio: AAC, 92.0 Kbps, 2 channels. YIFY encoded movies seem to have all crappy 2 channels audio at a low bitrate.

Video - good
Audio - poor
What a let down. Had to crank up the volume just to hear the dialogue :-(
@voidman99: I stopped downloading YIFY movies. they have brilliant picture quality, but they are unwatchable because of low audio bitrate and 2 channels only.

A: 10 
V: 10
Great upload thank you!!!
If it 1080p BRay rip, why is the res only 1920x800?  Should be 1920x1080!

it's widescreen dummyhead
would you prefer having the black bars included?
@ht0fff: wow, you're amazing! please tell us more about yourself!
Excellent torrent, 10/10. I always look for YIFY uploads first

YIFY is a dumbass. 

If you don't know what 1080P MEANS, then don't put it in the god damn title.
